sys_atf_test.description:
Test the navigation module for all user roles.
-- Create Users -- 1. Set up standard test records 2. -- Get Current User sys_id 3. Create new user named "TimeSheet Test" 4. Select any user without a role (Deactivated) 5. Impersonate TimeSheet Test (No current roles)
-- Test User without roles -- 6. Verify Time Tracking Application Menu is not visible. 7. Verify All Time Tracking modules are not visible
-- Test user With User Role -- 8. Impersonate initiating Admin 9. Add Time Tracking User role to "TimeSheet Test" 10. Impersonate TimeSheet Test (User Role) 11. Confirm Time Tracking application is visible 12. Confirm Proper Modules are visible:
-- Test user with Approver role -- 13. Impersonate initiating Admin 14. Remove User Role from TimeSheet Test 15. Add Approver role to TimeSheet Test 16. Impersonate TimeSheet Test (Admin Role) 17. Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible 18. Confirm Appropriate Modules are visible.
-- Test user with Approver and User roles -- 19. Impersonate initiating Admin 20. Add User Role to TimeSheet Test (User and Approver) 21. Impersonate TimeSheet Test (User And Approver Role) 22. Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible 23. Confirm Appropriate Modules are visible.
-- Test user with Finance Role -- 24. Impersonate initiating Admin 25. Remove Approver Role 26. Remove User Role 27. Add Finance Role 28. Impersonate TimeSheet Test (Finance) 29. Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible 30. Confirm Appropriate Modules are visible.
-- Test Admin Role -- 31. Impersonate initiating Admin 32. Remove Finance Role 33. Add Time Sheet Admin role to TimeSheet Test 34. Impersonate TimeSheet Test 35. Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible 36. Confirm All Modules are visible.
sys_atf_test.name: Time Tracking Nav Module
